are-you-sure-to-close: Are you sure to close the keychain?
please-create-an-issue: Please create an issue on GitHub if you experience a bug or have any suggestions or improvements.
about-text: It is very essential for us developers to have tools that facilitate our work, and with this extension it is intended to facilitate the management of passwords that we use on a daily basis without compromising their security by saving them in documents.
title: Title
password-clipboard: You have copied: password to clipboard
alert-lock-keys: Be careful when assigning the password to lock the keychain, because if you don't remember it, you can't unlock the keychain, since the password is not stored anywhere.
err: An error occurred, please try again later
